import React from 'react' import lookbook from '../../assets/lookbook.jpeg' import useCountDown from '../../components/CountDown/CountDown' import "./Lookbook.css" const Lookbook = () => { const endTime=new Date().getTime()+60000*2; //2 min const [timeLeft,setEndTime]=useCountDown(endTime); const hours = Math.floor(timeLeft /6000) %60 const minutes = Math.floor(timeLeft / 60000) % 60; const seconds = Math.floor(timeLeft / 1000) % 60; return (

{`${hours}:${minutes}:${seconds}`}

) } export default Lookbook
